name: Marissa
greetingText: Are you ready for next 365 days with me, I know I am
wishText: May the nerd power always be with you! ;)
text1: It's your birthday!!! :D. A year older , A year bolder
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday! my perfect lady. No poor jokes on your birthday , may you be the red wine which just gets finer and finer in taste and style with age -:)
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
